Sequence Information.Peptide Name: SpliDef (S. littoralis defensin; natural AMPs; insects, arthropods, invertebrates, animals;  3S=S, UCSS1a )
Sequence Information.Source: haemolymph; the African Cotton Leafworm;Spodoptera littoralis

Literature Information.Literature: APD analysis reveals that the sequence  is 34.0% similar toplant Cycloviolacin O14.Activity: zone diffusion: Active against S. sanguinis,  S. aureus, E. coli, and K. pneumoniae (inhibition zone comparable to control penicillin, 13 mm diam). UPdated 4/2020; 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Seufi AM1, Hafez EE, Galal FH.2011
Literature Information.Title: Identification, phylogenetic analysis and expression profile of an anionic insect defensin gene, with antibacterial activity, from bacterial-challenged cotton leafworm, Spodoptera littoralis.
